getMerchants

public DataLoader getMerchants(java.lang.String postCode,
                               double latitude,
                               double longitude,
                               java.lang.String city,
                               java.lang.String searchTerm,
                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> merchantTypeIds,
                               DataLoadListener listener,
                               java.lang.Integer limit,
                               java.lang.String externalId)
Description copied from interface: MerchantDAO
Load all merchants based on advance search criteria like type, location, term,… If limit and offset included, then paginated results are expected. Note that a page could contain less than limit locations in case the user can not see some private ones

Specified by:
getMerchants in interface MerchantDAO
Parameters:
postCode - Area to look. Optional
latitude - double with the location of merchants to retrieve. Optional.
longitude - double with the location of merchants to retrieve. Optional.
city - City to look. Optional
searchTerm - String with a search term to use in merchant filtering
limit - Amount of merchants to retrieve
externalId - externalId for merchant
Returns:
DataLoader object performing a network operation. When returned, it allows the external developer to cancel it in case the app does not need the data anymore

                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> merchantTypeIds,

                               java.lang.String externalId,

Specified by:
getMerchants in interface MerchantDAO
Parameters:

latitude - double with the location of merchants to retrieve
longitude - double with the location of merchants to retrieve
city - City to look. Optional
searchTerm - String with a search term to use in merchant filtering
limit - limit to fetch number of merchant. Optional.
externalId - externalId for merchant. Optional.
offset - Position of first merchant to be returned in paginated results. Optional.
Returns:
DataLoader object performing a network operation. When returned, it allows the external developer to cancel it in case the app does not need the data anymore

getClusterMerchant

public DataLoader getClusterMerchant(java.lang.String topRightLatLong,
                                     java.lang.String bottomLeftLatLong,
                                     java.lang.Integer maxResult,
                                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> merchantTypeIds,
                                     DataLoadListener listener)
Description copied from interface: MerchantDAO
Load all merchants in clusters based on location

Specified by:
getClusterMerchant in interface MerchantDAO
Parameters:
topRightLatLong - String with top right latitude and longitude in format "lat,long"
bottomLeftLatLong - String with bottom left latitude and longitude in format "lat,long"
maxResult - maximum amount of merchants that can be shown in the map (rest will be clustered)
merchantTypeIds - list of merchantType ids. Optional.
Returns:
DataLoader object performing a network operation. When returned, it allows the external developer to cancel it in case the app does not need the data anymore
